mods.abstract: Yearbook of Middle Tennessee State University
mods.accessCondition: Copyright protected. Reproduced with permission of the University Reproduction is permitted for non-profit educational and research purposes only; Credit to Special Collections, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University

relatedItem.abstract: Midlander was the student yearbook of the University from 1926 to 2004. This collection offers a complete digital copy of almost every issue.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
